title: Merry Christmas, Mom and Dad
description:
Mercer Mayer's Little Critter is getting ready for Christmas in this classic, funny, and heartwarming book.Whether he's making wreaths, eating gingerbread cookies, or putting the star on the top of the tree, both parents and children alike will relate to this cherished story. A perfect way to celebrate the holiday season!
Mercer Mayer's
 
Little Critter
 stories, which address all the major issues of growing up, are perennial favorites for generations of readers, both young and old!
author: Mercer Mayer
